Oligodendroglial Tumors
							                    Treatment of oligodendrogliomas may include the following:         -  Surgery with or without radiation therapy. Chemotherapy may be given after radiation therapy.         Treatment of anaplastic oligodendroglioma may include the following:         - Surgery followed by radiation therapy with or without chemotherapy.    - A clinical trial of a new treatment added to standard treatment.
